nodes.text: Jonna was a male individual that lived during the Galactic Civil War. He worked in Nagem Dr'Lar's salvage team, searching for debris of the destroyed Imperial Death Star in the jungles of Yavin 4.

One day in 1 ABY he discovered that he had lost a family heirloom and went back to an old work site of the salvage team to search for it. When he didn't return, Dr'Lar asked a spacer to search for him. The spacer found the work site devastated by a scavenger attack and a bloody trail leading off to the brush. Not far from the work site he found all that remained of Jonna's body and brought back the sad news to Dr'Lar.
